name: Triangulis
description:
Triangulis is a game where the four arrangements of triangles fall from the top and you try to position them as best as you can. Filling a row across the playing field that is parallel to the bottom will clear the row and score you major points. You advance a level for every 10 lines you clear and the pieces fall faster. The game supports Xbox 360 controllers and most other controllers for up to three players.

I really would like to know what you think about it. I'm @minkcv on twitter.

Design, graphics and programming by Will Smith (minkcv)

Music by David Buchheim
